title: ConcurrentModificationException due to high volume of requests
description:
When having high volume of requests,  the logs are filled with this exception. I have tried to reproduce it by sending queries using JMeter and it only happens when multiple queries are sent at the same time. I was able to reproduce it using 1x1, 2x4, 5x2
